data.actual_result: A duplicate Audit Log entry for the already created invite is made every time you press the button without having made any changes
data.expected_result: Either the button isn't able to be pressed unless you've changed one of the durations or pressing it doesn't generate a pointless Audit Log entry
data.short_description: Pressing Generate in the Invite modal while having not changed anything makes a pointless Audit Log entry
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Invite modal of a server - Go into Edit invite link - Press the Generate a New Link button - Exit the modal and go into the server's Audit Logs to observe the two exact same log entries
